info.name: KORE.ai PUBLIC API's
info.description: This collection covers all the KORE.ai public API'S.

item.name: Public APIs

request.description:
Used to Upload the botdefinition, botconfig, and botfunction file (if any)  as well as the bot icon to the local server and get the file ID. You need to upload the files separately.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-import-upload-file-api/

Uploading the bot definition file here at the API

Used to Upload the botdefinition, botconfig, and botfunction file (if any) as well as the bot icon to the local server and get the file ID. You need to upload the files separately.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-import-upload-file-api/

Uploading the bot config file here at the API

Used to Upload the botdefinition, botconfig, and botfunction file (if any) as well as the bot icon to the local server and get the file ID. You need to upload the files separately.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-import-upload-file-api/

Uploading the bot icon file here at the API

item.name: Import Bot as a New Bot API

request.description:
Import Bot as a New Bot API is used to create a new bot in the account ownerâ€™s Builder Tool using the File IDs generated by uploading the files to the local server. Bot Name and Purpose are optional fields as they will be taken from the existing bot copy. If the developer wants to have a new bot name, then optional field needs to be provided.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-bot-as-a-new-bot-api/

Creating a new bot by using the file IDs generated for bot definition, bot config and bot icon file at previous endpoints.

Used to get the status of the bot import request initiated using Import Bot as New Bot API or Import Bot into an Existing Bot API.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-import-status-api/

Checking the status of Bot Import for the bot being created at the previous endpoint

Used to initiate a publish request for a bot. Before calling the Publish Bot API, make sure that at least one channel is enabled for the bot.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/publish-bot-api/

Publishing the bot created at the previous endpoints here at this API.

item.name: Bot Export API - Full Export of Published Version

request.description:
Used to export bot definition and all associated components. This API only initiates the export process. Use Export Status API to view the progress of the export and also to get a link to download the file once the export is completed.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-export-api/

exec: var d = new Date();  // Possible memory leak?

request.description:
Gets the status of Bot Export request and also provides the download link of the bot export copy after the export is completed. 

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-export-status-api/

item.name: Import Bot into an Existing Bot API

request.description:
Used to import bot definition file into an existing bot for upgrading to new version or restoring to an earlier version.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-bot-into-an-existing-bot-api/

Used to export bot definition and all associated components. This API only initiates the export process. Use Export Status API to view the progress of the export and also to get a link to download the file once the export is completed.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-export-api/

Partial export of latest version of the bot is detailed here at this API

Imports global and content variables into the bot.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-variables-import/

Exports global and content variables from a bot.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-variables-export/

To get the list of changes made to the bot definition for a given date period. 
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-changelogs-api/
Find intent API considering only the published tasks of the bot
Find intent API considering only the configured version of tasks in the bot

Used to Upload the ML utterances
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/bot-import-upload-file-api/

Imports ML Utterances into a bot

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-utterances-import-api/

Gets the status of the ML utterances import request made through Import ML Utterances API.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-utterances-import-status-api/

To initiate ML training of a bot
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-training-api/

To get the status of the ML training
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-training-status-api/

Used to export the ML utterances of a bot. It creates a request ID from which we can generate the Download link of the bot using ML Utterance Export Status API

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-utterances-export-api/

item.name: ML Utterances Export Status API Copy

request.description:
Gets the download link of the ML Utterances export copy

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/ml-utterances-export-status-api/

To initiate the training of the knowledge graph

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/faq-training-api/

To get the status of the FAQ training
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/faq-training-status-api/

This API retrieves the conversation sessions created. This API is available in BT and BAC app scopes
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/sessions-api/

This API retrieves the conversation sessions created. This API is available in BT and BAC app scopes
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/sessions-api/

Fetches the conversational messages between the bot and user in reverse chronological order. This API supports pagination. You can provide offset/skip and limit to get a certain number of messages at a time.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/conversation-history-api/

item.name: Conversation History API - All Bots - To include Session Id and MetaTags

request.description:
Fetches the conversational messages between the bot and user in reverse chronological order. This API supports pagination. You can provide offset/skip and limit to get a certain number of messages at a time.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/conversation-history-api/

item.name: Conversation History API - To include Session Id and MetaTags

request.description:
Fetches the conversational messages between the bot and user in reverse chronological order. This API supports pagination. You can provide offset/skip and limit to get a certain number of messages at a time.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/conversation-history-api/

To get debug logs of a specific conversation (currently supported only for IVR Channel)
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/debug-logs-api/

item.description: This Folder has test cases for Smart bot import with public API's which covers both Import as new bot and import into existing Bot.

item.name: EERS Public API's

request.description:
To retrieve the list of bots available in an account.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-bots-api/

item.name: Upload file API - Import Admin Roles

request.description:
To import admin roles into an account. This is typically used to import roles from one environment to another.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-roles-api/ and 
https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-roles-api/

To import admin roles into an account. This is typically used to import roles from one environment to another.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-roles-api/

item.name: Upload file API - Import Bot Roles

request.description:
To import bot roles into an account. This is typically used to import roles from one environment to another.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-roles-api/ and 
https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-roles-api/
To import bot roles into an account. This is typically used to import roles from one environment to another. More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/import-roles-api/

To retrieve the list of bot roles available in an account.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-roles-api/
To retrieve the list of admin roles available in an account. More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-roles-api/

To get full information of all users and their associated roles in the account.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-user-roles-details-api/

To get the list of groups and group members available in the account.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/get-groups-api/
To export bot roles from an account. This is typically used to export roles from one environment to another. More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/export-roles-api/

To export admin roles from an account. This is typically used to export roles from one environment to another.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/export-roles-api/

To assign a bot role to a set of users in a specific bot.

More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/assign-bt-roles-api/

item.name: Assign BT Roles API - Revoke role

request.description:
To revoke a bot role to a set of users in a specific bot.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/assign-bt-roles-api/

To add users or groups from admin roles.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/assign-admin-roles-api/

item.name: Assign Admin Roles API - Revoke role

request.description:
To remove users or groups from admin roles.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/assign-admin-roles-api/

To add the ability to access bot builder, create new bots.
More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/update-user-access-api/

item.name: Update User Access API - Remove Access

request.description: To remove the ability to access bot builder, create new bots. More details at https://developer.kore.ai/docs/bots/api-guide/update-user-access-api/

item.description: This folder contains piblic APi's related to Roles.
